pageContext.claim: “Democrats slam GOP healthcare proposal as Obamacare premiums & deductibles increase by over 100%. Remember keep your doctor, keep your plan?”
pageContext.analysis: Premium increases range from single digits in certain states to upwards of 100 percent in others, so Trump is using the higher end of the range. Moreover, he uses the calculation of premium increases without incorporating the impact of tax credits — which most people in the exchanges receive. If you take the subsidies into account, the average monthly premium of most people in the individual market exchange goes down, not up
